atk-abh03a15:1_3: catunnaṁ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī’’ti (saṁ. ni.
atk-abh03a15:1_4: 5.408) satipaṭṭhānasaṁyutte vuttanayeneva yesaṁ kāyādayo satiyā ārammaṇadhamme gahetvā ‘‘sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi etarahi andhakānaṁ.
atk-abh03a15:1_5: Andhakā nāma pubbaseliyā, aparaseliyā, rājagiriyā, siddhatthikāti ime pacchā uppannanikāyā.
atk-abh03a15:1_6: Tesaṁ laddhivivecanatthaṁ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a15:1_9: Satiyā paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti iminā atthena satigocarāpi satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh03a15:1_12: Satiyova paṭṭhānā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti iminā atthena satiyova satipaṭṭhānā.
atk-abh03a15:1_14: Ye pana taṁ pariyāyaṁ pahāya ekanteneva ‘‘sabbe dhammā satipaṭṭhānā’’ti vadanti, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, ārammaṇavasena paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a15:1_15: Sabbe dhammā satīti anuyuttassa pana sabbesaṁ satisabhāvābhāvato paṭikkhepo tasseva.
atk-abh03a15:1_17: Ekāyanamaggo hi kilesānaṁ khayabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ gacchatīti khayagāmī.
atk-abh03a15:1_20: Evametehi padehi ‘‘kiṁ te sabbe dhammā evarūpo te ekāyano maggo hotī’’ti pucchati.
